description: Try our easy to follow Lobster Salad With Watercress recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Lobster dishes,Pescatarian,Salad,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Lobster Salad With Watercress Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large bunch watercress, tough stalks removed
8 sundried tomatoes in oil, drained and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: To make the dressing, combine the egg, egg yolk, mustard, and lemon zest and juice in a food processor. Slowly add the oil. Add the dill and season. Transfer to a bowl, cover, and refrigerate.
Combine the red onion and vinegar in a bowl. Let stand for 10 minutes. Drain well.
Remove the lobster meat from the shell, and chop it in large chunks.
Divide the watercress among 4 plates, and add the fennel, onion, tomatoes, and lobster; drizzle with the dressing. Serve with more dressing served on the side.
